attributes.action: Award A Pssthumous Knighthood; MBE or CBE to Stephen Sutton
attributes.additional_details: Given the inspirational efforts of Stephen Sutton and the vast amount of money raised before and since his passing, his efforts should be rewarded, applauded & recognosed by posthumously awarding him a Knighthood, MBE or CBE.  This would also recognise the efforts and support his family and the wider Community have made.
